00034 #include "private/ReactorPropagator.hh"
00035 #include "Constraints.hh"

00037 #include <PLASMA/RuleInstance.hh>
00038 #include <PLASMA/Token.hh>
00039 #include <PLASMA/TokenVariable.hh>
00040 
00041 EUROPA::TokenId TREX::europa::details::parent_token(EUROPA::ConstrainedVariableId const &var) {
00042   EUROPA::EntityId e(var->parent());
00043 
00044   if( e.isId() ) {
00045     if( EUROPA::TokenId::convertable(e) ) {
00046       // The parent is a token => return it
00047       return e;
00048     }
00049     
00050     if(EUROPA::RuleInstanceId::convertable(e) ) {
00051       // The parent is a rule => it should be attached to a token
00052       EUROPA::RuleInstanceId r(e);
00053       
00054       return r->getToken();
00055     }
00056   }
00057   // Any other case reflects that the parnet is not a token
00058   return EUROPA::TokenId::noId();
00059 }

00069 ReactorConstraint::ReactorConstraint(EUROPA::LabelStr const &name,
00070                                  EUROPA::LabelStr const &propagatorName,
00071                                  EUROPA::ConstraintEngineId const &cstrEngine,
00072                                  std::vector<EUROPA::ConstrainedVariableId> const &vars)
00073   :EUROPA::Constraint(name, propagatorName, cstrEngine, vars),
00074    m_assembly(&details::assembly(cstrEngine)) {}
00075 
00076 // Observers 
00077 
00078 Assembly &ReactorConstraint::assembly() {
00079   return *m_assembly;
00080 }

00082 /*
00083  * class TREX::europa::CheckInternal
00084  */
00085 
00086 // structors 
00087 
00088 CheckInternal::CheckInternal(EUROPA::LabelStr const &name,
00089                           EUROPA::LabelStr const &propagatorName,
00090                           EUROPA::ConstraintEngineId const &cstrEngine,
00091                           std::vector<EUROPA::ConstrainedVariableId> const &vars)
00092   :ReactorConstraint(name, propagatorName, cstrEngine, vars), m_obj(NULL) {
00093   
00094   if( m_variables.size()==2 )
00095     m_obj = &(getCurrentDomain(m_variables[1]));
00096   else {
00097     if( m_variables.size()!=1 )
00098       throw EuropaException("Constraint "+name.toString()+
00099                          " requires 1 or 2 arguments");
00100     EUROPA::TokenId tok(details::parent_token(m_variables[0]));
00101     if( tok.isId() ) {
00102       m_obj = &(getCurrentDomain(tok->getObject()));
00103     }
00104   }
00105   m_test = &(getCurrentDomain(m_variables[0]));
00106 }
00107 
00108 // manipulators
00109 
00110 void CheckInternal::handleExecute() {
00111   if( NULL!=m_obj ) {
00112     Assembly &a = assembly();
00113     EUROPA::DataTypeId type(m_obj->getDataType());
00114 
00115     if( a.isAgentTimeline(type) ) {
00116       EUROPA::ObjectDomain const &dom(*m_obj);
00117       std::list<EUROPA::ObjectId> ints, n_ints, 
00118        vals = dom.makeObjectList();
00119       for(std::list<EUROPA::ObjectId>::const_iterator i=vals.begin();
00120          vals.end()!=i; ++i) {
00121        if( a.isInternal(*i) ) 
00122          ints.push_back(*i);
00123        else 
00124          n_ints.push_back(*i);     
00125       }
00126       if( !ints.empty() ) {
00127        if( n_ints.empty() ) {
00128          // All the possible objects are internal => test==true
00129          m_test->intersect(true, true);
00130          debugMsg("trex:cstr:internal", "AFTER \n\ttest "<<m_test->toString());
00131        } else if( m_test->isSingleton() ) {
00132          std::auto_ptr<EUROPA::ObjectDomain> tmp;
00133          
00134          if( m_test->isMember(true) ) {
00135            // test is true => only internal timelines should be part of the set
00136            tmp.reset(new EUROPA::ObjectDomain(type, ints));
00137          } else {
00138            // test is false => only non internal timelines should be part of the set
00139            tmp.reset(new EUROPA::ObjectDomain(type, n_ints));
00140          }
00141          // restirct object to the corresponding subset 
00142          m_obj->intersect(*tmp);
00143          debugMsg("trex:cstr:internal", "AFTER \n\tobject "<<m_obj->toString());
00144        }
00145        return; 
00146       }
00147     }
00148   }
00149   // At this point I know that this object is not an internal timeline
00150   m_test->intersect(false, false);
00151 }

00155  * class TREX::europa::CheckExternal

00158 // structors 
00159 
00160 CheckExternal::CheckExternal(EUROPA::LabelStr const &name,
00161                           EUROPA::LabelStr const &propagatorName,
00162                           EUROPA::ConstraintEngineId const &cstrEngine,
00163                           std::vector<EUROPA::ConstrainedVariableId> const &vars)
00164   :ReactorConstraint(name, propagatorName, cstrEngine, vars), m_obj(NULL) {
00165   
00166   if( m_variables.size()==2 )
00167     m_obj = &(getCurrentDomain(m_variables[1]));
00168   else {
00169     if( m_variables.size()!=1 )
00170       throw EuropaException("Constraint "+name.toString()+
00171                          " requires 1 or 2 arguments");
00172     EUROPA::TokenId tok(details::parent_token(m_variables[0]));
00173     if( tok.isId() ) {
00174       m_obj = &(getCurrentDomain(tok->getObject()));
00175     }
00176   }
00177   m_test = &(getCurrentDomain(m_variables[0]));
00178 }
00179 
00180 // manipulators
00181 
00182 void CheckExternal::handleExecute() {
00183   if( NULL!=m_obj ) {
00184     Assembly &a = assembly();
00185     EUROPA::DataTypeId type(m_obj->getDataType());
00186 
00187     if( a.isAgentTimeline(type) ) {
00188       EUROPA::ObjectDomain const &dom(*m_obj);
00189       std::list<EUROPA::ObjectId> exts, n_exts, 
00190        vals = dom.makeObjectList();
00191       for(std::list<EUROPA::ObjectId>::const_iterator i=vals.begin();
00192          vals.end()!=i; ++i) {
00193        if( a.isExternal(*i) ) 
00194          exts.push_back(*i);
00195        else 
00196          n_exts.push_back(*i);     
00197       }
00198       if( !exts.empty() ) {
00199        if( n_exts.empty() ) {
00200          // All the possible objects are external => test==true
00201          m_test->intersect(true, true);
00202          debugMsg("trex:cstr:external", "AFTER \n\ttest "<<m_test->toString());
00203        } else if( m_test->isSingleton() ) {
00204          std::auto_ptr<EUROPA::ObjectDomain> tmp;
00205          
00206          if( m_test->isMember(true) ) {
00207            // test is true => only external timelines should be part of the set
00208            tmp.reset(new EUROPA::ObjectDomain(type, exts));
00209          } else {
00210            // test is false => only non external timelines should be part of the set
00211            tmp.reset(new EUROPA::ObjectDomain(type, n_exts));
00212          }
00213          // restirct object to the corresponding subset 
00214          m_obj->intersect(*tmp);
00215          debugMsg("trex:cstr:external", "AFTER \n\tobject "<<m_obj->toString());
00216        }
00217        return; 
00218       }
00219     }
00220   }
00221   // At this point I know that this object is not an external timeline
00222   m_test->intersect(false, false);
00223 }
00224 
00225 /*
00226  * class TREX::europa::Bind
00227  */ 
00228 
00229 // structors 
00230 Bind::Bind(EUROPA::LabelStr const &name,
00231           EUROPA::LabelStr const &propagatorName,
00232           EUROPA::ConstraintEngineId const &cstrEngine,
00233           std::vector<EUROPA::ConstrainedVariableId> const &vars)
00234   :EUROPA::Constraint(name, propagatorName, cstrEngine, vars) {
00235   if( m_variables.size()!=2 )
00236     throw EuropaException("constraint "+name.toString()
00237                        +" requires exactly 2 arguments");
00238   m_target = m_variables[0];
00239   m_default = m_variables[1];
00240   
00241   if( !m_target->getDataType()->isAssignableFrom(m_default->getDataType()) )
00242     throw EuropaException("constraint "+name.toString()+
00243                        " require that the 2nd argument is convertible into "
00244                        " the first argument");
00245 }
00246 
00247 // observers 
00248 
00249 bool Bind::guardSatisfied() const {
00250   return m_target->isActive() && m_default->lastDomain().isSingleton() &&
00251     !m_target->lastDomain().isSingleton();
00252 }
00253 
00254 // manipulators
00255 
00256 void Bind::handleExecute() {
00257   if( guardSatisfied() ) {
00258     EUROPA::Domain &domain = getCurrentDomain(m_target);
00259     
00260     debugMsg("trex:cstr:bind", "BEFORE "<<m_target->getName().toString()
00261             <<"="<<m_target->toString()<<", default="<<m_default->toString());
00262     
00263     if( domain.intersects(m_default->lastDomain()) ) {
00264       // simple case : the default value is on the target domain
00265       domain.intersect(m_default->lastDomain());
00266     } else {
00267       EUROPA::edouble lb, ub, 
00268        val = m_default->lastDomain().getSingletonValue();
00269       domain.getBounds(lb, ub);
00270       EUROPA::edouble dist_to_lo = std::abs(lb-val),
00271        dist_to_hi = std::abs(ub-val);
00272       
00273       if( dist_to_hi<dist_to_lo ) {
00274        // Upper bound is closer to val => restrict to it
00275        domain.intersect(ub, ub);
00276       } else {
00277        // Lower bound is closer to val => restrict to it
00278        domain.intersect(lb, lb);
00279       }
00280     }
00281     debugMsg("trex:cstr:bind", "AFTER "<<m_target->getName().toString()
00282             <<"="<<m_target->toString()<<", default="<<m_default->toString());
00283     
00284   }
00285 }
